```{mermaid}
classDiagram
    direction LR
    Item "*" --> "1" File
    Data "*" --> "*" Item
    class File{
        +Path path
        +Timestamp begin
        +Timestamp end
        +float sample_rate
        +read(start,stop)
    }
    class Item{
        +File file
        +Timestamp begin
        +Timestamp end
        +get_value()
    }
    class Data{
        +list~Item~ items
        +float sample_rate
        +get_value()
        +from_files(list~File~,start,stop)$ Data
    }
```
